epoetics.core

Class Keyword

  • java.lang.Object
    • epoetics.core.Keyword

  • public class Keyword
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a keyword. A keyword is represented by a string and a score which represents the importance of the keyword in the linguistic unit it is computed from.
    Author:
    Andreas Müller

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) java.lang.String keyword
      The string representing this keyword.
      (package private) float score
      The score of this keyword representing, for example, the importance of the keyword in a word cloud.
